reviewText:
Playboy - Hot Latin Ladies is fifty-four minutes and was released on January 12, 1999. Playboy is known for the girl next door image; well there is one or two that must not have lived next door. Your host for Playboy - Hot Latin Ladies is Maria Checa; Miss August 1994. She gets poor ratings from me. When Maria was featured, she was nude less then twenty percent of her open and closing scenes. You had at least four beauties that were 100% nude. You also have two other playmates in this DVD as well. The following is a list of ladies in the order that they appeared and how I rated their nudity:

Overall this is much better then most Playboy DVD's that are out there. Playboy - Hot Latin Ladies gets a B from me.

Hot, Erotic and sensual!  Yes! That's it! This is Playboy video! Girls not being shy to show all of their 'details' and directors driving the camera lens right in, for our pleasure ! The ladies are one better than the other,  all of the genuine Latin type. Sensual, curvy, with that 'sun tan' color  skin that drives me wild as well as hairy in the correct amount and places!  I enjoyed this video as much as I expected.

The women in this video are almost without exception very beautiful and alluring.  The production values are quite high, and the video usually focuses on the seductive and erotic form of the women rather than corny  situations.  One notable exception is a nude basketball game between two  Puerto Rican women which is more silly than it is sexy.  However, overall  this is a good buy.
